item.text: de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa
rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol// tu phyin pa ni bgyi bam mchis
pa'i byed pa po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang/ chos thams cad kyi bar du dmigasaM sumad[/]
ba'on pos shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la lnga stong spyod par bgyi lags/bcom
shis 'bazhis/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di 'byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshogazugs lam spyod na/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// dbazhin du
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'dubyad rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ danishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo
spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyongan/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa yin no// gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyongan/ de nishes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa yin
@#/ 'o da bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi spyod
dani shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa yin no// gzugs 'di zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ma spyodan/den shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la stod pa yin no// dbazhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byad rnams dang/ rnamo pa shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
na da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag mdu rus kyis bya bar mi spyodan/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyopa yin no//dbazhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdagamad nus bab/
mi spyodan/ nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin// gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi sto ba zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ daneshasa'ab
kyi pha rol tubyin pa la spyod pa yin// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ bdu byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ rje
ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am mchanamamed ces bya bar mi spyod na/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin
no/ d+ha dbazhinadutshor ba dong/ 'dzushes dang 'du byongs dang/ rnam par shes pa mchan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mnamam byed bya ba'am spyod na/ donishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa yan no// gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyodan/ nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushas
dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/ smon pamang ces bya bar mi spyongan/ da shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/[” ]/gags nazhes bya
ba 'am/ ma zhazhes bya bar mi sbyong na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// du bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byad nams dang/ rnam par shes po//
zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya khar mi spyodan/ da nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dban zhes bya bar mi spyodan/
de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba 'am
mi dben zhes bya bar mi sprong na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyod pa yin no// gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am 3 rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni nyis
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa kumanas nyon mos zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar
mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs sku zhes bya ba 'am mi skya zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes thub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no
de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye zhes bru ba rom/ mi skyes zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
yin no// gzugs 'gag ces bya ba 'am/ mi 'gag ces bya b.ram sbyo nga na/ do ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang ) 'dushes dang/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa 'gag ces bya ba 'am mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod na de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gzugs dngos po
tha yod ces bya ba'am dngos po med ces bya bar mi sod na/ da ni shes rab kyi pha phol tu phyin pa la sprod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po med ces bya bar ma spyod na ) de nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la stod pa yin no// gzugs gtsang zhes bya ba 'am/
mi gtsang zhes bya bar mi ste ngan/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin dutshor ba dang/ 'du nos dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes
pa gtsang zhes bya ba 'am/ mi gtsang zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ dan shes rab kyis rol du phyin ba laskyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sAr te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba nas/ de bzhin du mig gi bar la gtsang zhes bya ba ram mi gtsang zhes bya bar mi spyod na[Y ]de na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs rtag ces bu ba'am mi rtag ces bya ba
yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ de bzhin du bde zhes bu ba 'am ) sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ bdago ces bya ba rom/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ stong zhes grub 'amad
bu// ma stong zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am/ mtshanam med ces bya ba'am/ sAn ba yod ces bya ba'am/ so na ba med ces bya ba 'am/
ni zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhis bya ba 'am/ dben zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dban zhes bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par byang zhes bya ba 'am/ skya/
zhes bya ba 'am/ 'gag ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po medaces bya ba 'am/ gtsang zhes bya ba 'am/ mi gtsang zhes bya bar yang dag bar rjes su mi/
mthong/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dunas dang da 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba dang ) de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi
rtag ces bya ba 'am/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba rom/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gtsang zhes bya ba 'am/ mi
gtsang zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod pa na/ gzugs yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ de na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa shes pa yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba 'om/ yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprodapa yin no//
de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la spyod
yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song ba na/ gzugs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs la/
dbazhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs shing/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
ba nyid kyi bar du yang du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs ba'aphur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
to btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg ba pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ma mchis pa de dag legs par
bshad pa ni ngo mtsharalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/
dpar tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sams dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa med pa dag legs par bshad pa/
yin no/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi par sgol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags/
zhes bya gar gyi sog/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba chags zhes bya
ba'am ka ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang
yid chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar ma spyodan/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/
ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos rnams chags zhes bya ba 'am ) ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yAn no// de bzhin
du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rtsol du phyin pa chags zhes bya ba nam/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ da na)shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sur te/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags/zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'bags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya ba mi spyodan/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar daM/ de
bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi skyod// de na shes rngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags zhes bya ba lam/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags zhes bya ba 'am/ ma chags zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ 4) de bzhin du
sbalato/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shesaso// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
dang/ 'du byed rnams dung/ rnam bar nas ba chags zhes bya ba yang dag brta8nyis so// de bzhin du sbar te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags
zhes bya bar yang dag par shes so// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong b.le'abras bu dang/ phyi ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang de bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du chags zhes bya bar yang dag par shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
chas gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos zab mo 'di na ma bshad kyang 'grub pa ma mchis la/ bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// jisad slas pa de bzhin tu/
chos zab mo 'di ma bshad kyi 'grib pa med la// b.rashad kyang 'phel ba med do// rab 'byor dpar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod na/ nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba medal/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib
pa mad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du skya ma'i skyes bu la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phal ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
du chos de ni ma bshad kyang 'grib pa modo la/ bshad kyang 'phel ba med do// bshad kyang de kho nar zad la/ ma bshad kyang de kho nar zad do// de nas bcom ldan
'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa na mi zhum ma 'gong ste/ zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis la/ zhum pa ma mchis shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir ma ldog pa ni dka' ba brgyud pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'dani nam mkha' la sgom pa lagasungashing/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin taM ) nam mkha' la nishes
rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis pa nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis/ chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
dang rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni nang stong ba nyid ma mchis pa nas/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/
po stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis/ nam mkha ral ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis pa nas// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du ma mas/ de bzhinagashegs
pa'i stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis ) nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byung chub dang/ rgyan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achon po gang dag go cha chen pa 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag/
sams can rnams kyi slad du go cha'atshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i slad du brtson par 'tshal ba dang/ 'bad par 'tshal ba dang rtsol bar 'tshal ba dag lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das gang dag sems can rnams 'khor ba las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing/ go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su thar par bgyi bar 'tshal ba lags so// btsun pa bcos
ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po 'tshal ba de dag ni bar snang 'degs par 'tshal ba lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po thob pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni dba' ba dang
brtul phod pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dab na sems dpa' chen po gang dag nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi skad du/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba lags shing/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang mtshungs pa ma mchis
pa'i go cha'atshal ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasasha stag gis dpar bgyin 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu 'am shing gi tshal lam/ 'bras sA lu'i zhing ngam ) mda'
rgya'i tshal ltar yongs su gtams par gyur cid/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs te chos bshad/
par gyural/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par gyur kyang/
btsun ba bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la ni bro ba 'am gang bar ma mngonalags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du dang/ sems can dben
pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar to/ phyogs bcu'i rajig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyas par sbyang bar bgyi sta/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na 'di
skad du gang dag sems can rnamasakyi slad du go chachenapo 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bapa'atshal ba de dag
ninamamakha' yongs su thar par bgyi ba'apa'atshal ba lags so zhes mchis lags so// de nas 'khor de nyid na dag slong zhig 'di snyam du/ kye ma btsun pa bcos ldan 'das
chos 'ga' yang mi skyes ma 'gag kyang/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang mchis/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
po'ang mchis shing/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang mchis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom ba nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ de ngan
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mches/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang mchis/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang mchis
chos dkon mchog kyang mchis/ dge 'dun dkonamchog kyang mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo sAm mo/
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces sus so// btsun pa rnab 'byor byang chub sems dba'ashes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
rnal 'byedu snyoms pa 'jug ba de gang la rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pa yin/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa de gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du
snyoms par 'jug par bya bar sams pa de ni/ nam mkha ral rnal 'byor du snyoms par 'jug pa yin no// de sa bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chad ba dang/ klog pa dad
kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gas bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sA ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/
blo/ tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smAs so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyis gsal bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sA ba bya ba yang dag par rjes su/
mthong ngam snus pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag dza skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
'di la gnas nas/ de nyid de dag gi bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ su pa bya bar gyu rato/ de dag la mi dang mi ma yin pa glags myol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/
rigs kyi bu 'am ) rogs kyi bu mo gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la gnas pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gang
zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sA ba bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang//
bskyab pa dang sba ba bya bar sems pa yin no// ko'u shi ka khyod kyis rmi lam dang/ smig rgyu ngang/ mig yor dang/ sgyu ma dang/ sprul ba la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang//
grwa bar nus sam/ rgyas pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// ko'u sha ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba
dga' srung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sa b.rasems pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'grub pa dang ngal ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ ko'u shi ka 'ad dzi snyam dusams/ khyod kyis de bzhin/
gshegs pa ram/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sa brlanus sam/ sAs po/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gang
zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dpa' srung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sra ba bya bar sems pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'grub pa dang
a ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sams/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyangs dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i dbyings la bsrus
ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sA b.ranus sam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma yin no// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar to/ 'di lta ste//
ma u0f7a 'grub pa dang ngal ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur bar zad do/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun
pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na re zhig rmi lam lta bu dang/
[E/ ]sIg rgya lta bu dang/ brag cha lta bu dang/ skya ma lta bu dang/ sprul pa lta bu r chos rnams ji ltar yongs su shes pa yin/ de shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rmalam lta bu r rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rdzomasams su ma byed pa yin/ de skad ces sas pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
'di skad ces sma sa so// ko'u shi ka gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs su rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs
kyis rlomasams su ma byed/ gzugasakyi rlom sems su ma byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su ma byed cing/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes par rlom sems su ma byed/ rnam pa'ashes pas rlom sems su ma byed/ rnam par shes pa'i ma sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su ma byed la
de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sdur de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su ma byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
pa nyid kyi snyomasams su ma byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/
chos rnams las lta bu nas/ chos rnams sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes pa yin te/ de shes nas smi lam du rlom sems su mi byed/ smi lam gyis rlom sems su ma byed/ rmi lam
gyi rlom sems sum byed ) rmi lam la rlomasams su mi byed pa nas/ sprul ba'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i rlom sems su ma byed/
stsal pa la'ang rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyira'o/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i rjes kyi lha rnams
dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs ris rnams dang/ tshangs
pa'amadun 'don rnams dang/ tshangs 'khor rnams dang/ tshangs ba chen bo rnams dang/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad/
kyis lha'i me tog dag dang/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma dag dang/ spos kyi phye ma dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der logs su dong ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig du 'khod do/ ]de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag dang/ gnas
gtsang ma'i bar gyi lha de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid kyis chos stonacing ming 'ad zhes bya ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong rab 'byor

ces bya ba sha stag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byed la/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byanesha stag shes rab kyi pha sol tu phyin pa'i le'u'adi nyid yongs su zhu ba byed pa dag/
mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin dulho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang ) 'og gi phyogs dang/ stong gi phyogs dang/ de bzhin du phyogs mtshams bzhi po'i
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur te ) gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rgya cher thams cad du sbyar bar bya'od/ de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par
pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur 'o// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gsheg
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang sa phyogs 'di nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur ro/
nas bcom ldan 'das/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bco ma ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtags gang dag dang/ mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub/
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'ashes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur
lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuro'o//
gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med cas bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
gzugs smyon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyura'o// gzugs ni zhes bya ba dang/ ma she zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
ro[：]gzugs dben 'os pa ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par byang zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
'gyu ra'o// gzugs sku zhes bya ba dang/ gag kyis bya bar rjes ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs dngos bo yodapyis bya ba dang/ dngos po med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
ro gzugs gtsang zhes bya ba dang/ mi gtsang zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba dang/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur 'o//
de gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa btangs zhes bya ba dang/ grol zhes ba bar rgyus ston par mi 'gyur ro//
gzugs 'das zhes bya ba dang/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang/ da lta'i byung ba zhes bya bar chosaston par mi 'gyu ra'o/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
dang/ rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba dang/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyura'o// de bzhin du sbyar te ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
ti da kyi bar du 'das zhes bya ba dang/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba dang/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par ma 'gyuraro// gzugs shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba dang/ shin tu rnam par
ba dag ces bya bar chos ston ba ra mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dgaces bya ba dang/ shin
tu rnam par ma dag ces bya bar chos ston par ma 'gyur go/ de bzhin du sbyarato/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shani ju rnam par dag ces bya ba dang/ shin tu rnam b.ram dag ces bya
bar chos ston pa'ami lcagyuralo do nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa ba 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
ni yongs su dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// 'as 'byod
bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag ba yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcos
ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rtsol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs sna ba
kyi med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam pa byung ba med pa'i phyin/ gzugs yongs su dag pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shog/
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sa ba mad pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa 35shes pa yongs su
dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongasaNasu dag pa'i phyir/ shen ngas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das ji lta nanam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ 'ashes rab kyi pha thol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkhar skya ba med
pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par bung ba med pa'i phyin/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byorogazhan yang gzugs
[/]gos pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang ) rnam par shes pa gos pa med
pa'i phyir/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol
du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzung du med ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//
de bzhin du nam mkha' la tha snyad gdags su med pa'i phyir/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor dparan nam mkha' la brag cha gnyis kyi sgra grags pa de ga'i
du rab 'byor nam mkha'al tha snyad gdags su med pa'i phyir/ 'ashes rab kyi pha sol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha'
dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ci'ang dmigs su med pa'i phyir
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med ba dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/
rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyari/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang/
khyu// gag pa ma mchis pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang 3 rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bshes rngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa/
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin turnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am ) rigs kyi bu gang la la shug shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig nad
'byung bar ma 'gyur/ rna ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ sna nad 'byung bar ma 'gyur/ lce nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyu dra lus had+ha nga yang kA 7 paN
par ma 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'gum par ma 'gyur lags so// 'di lta ste/ rgyal rtse na 'a 2 saM lha rnams nas 3 gnas gtsang ma'i gA lha so
b+hI mang po dag kyang de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur lags so// chos brgyad dod/ bcu bzhi dang/ tshes bco lnga la gang na rigs kyi bu 'am ) rigs du rgyas ston pa de gnyis rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du bgyid pa dang/ 'chad par lha'i tshogs mang po mchi bar 'gyur zhing/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis ) tshad ma mchis/
bsam gyis ma khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa mang po drag skya bar 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu 'am ) rigs kyi bu mo tshos brgyad dang/ tshes bcu bzhi dang tshes bco lngal shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa dang/ 'chad par byed pa na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med pa mang po dag skye bar
'gyur zhing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad kha ton du khyod ba dang/ 'chad par byed pa na/ lha'i 'khoramadun du gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhi na ) rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
kashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di narin po che yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de la rin po che ni 'di yin te/ 'ashes bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba las yongs su tha2
bar byed pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang ) gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ mi dbul po dang/ gnod sbyin dbul po dang/ klu dbul po las yongs su thar pa'i byed pa yin no/
bu@#// gzhan yang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams sbyin par byed ba dang/ de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang/ khyim bdag yod

la chen po lta bu rnams dang/ tshong dponashing sA la chen po lta bu rnams sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi' ris kyi lha rnams kun ng du skye ba sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin dusUt+tat+taM

'du shes med 'du shes med man sku mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du lan cig pa' 'ong ba'i 'bras

phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par M rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa yin no// de nga'i phyir zhe na/ 2pa 'byor shes byas
kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dir dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher bstan te: de la bslabs nas rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang ) de bzhin du bram ze rigs
kashing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang/ khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang/ tshong dpon hing sa la chen po lta bu dang/ de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i bas kyi lha rnams yod pa nas
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bar dag 'jig rten na yod pa dang/ de bzhin du tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs ba'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs 3 ra rnams dang/
tshangs pa chen po rnams dang/ 'od chu rnams dang/ tshad med 'od rnams dang/ 'od gsal rnams dang/ dge ba rnams dang/ dge chung rnams dang/ tshad mad dge rnams dang//
dge rgyas rnams dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na yodapa dang/ de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang/ de bzhin du lan cig
phyipa'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang da dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur
ba dang/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni bsam gtan bzhi bstan pa yod pa dang/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bstan pa yod pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yod pa dang/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin phyin pa dang/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yod pa dang/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid bstan pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid bstan pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa
nyid bstan pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod pa dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bstan pa dang/ gong
ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bstan pa yod pa de/ de la bslabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs
[E/ ]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa'i phyir te/ des na radi lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha tse'og tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//
'ab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa bam po bcu dgu pa// rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyo ba nam/ 'gag pa 'am ) kun nas nyon mongs pa u0f10/ par byung ba 38[']
yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/ gtang ba bya ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ad lta chos gang su ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa nas/ rnam pa 5
byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/ gtang bar bya ba med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'abyor rin po che'i pha lol tu phyin pa 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba ma lung du ga du yod pa 20
lung du ma bstan pa nam/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus pa su gang[;]
dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dmigs su med pa yin no// rab 'byor rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chog gang gis kyang shes pa med do/
de ci'i phyirazhe na/ rab 'byoragang 'di ltar gang dag gi rin po che'ipha thol tu phyin pa shes par 'gyur ba'i ches dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'abyor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba ni de ltar yang kun tu ma 'dzin cing/ de ltar yang rnam par rtog bar ma byed la/ de ltar yang spros bar mi byed na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa yin te 3 sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur sti dang/ ri mo dang/ mchod pa byed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du 'gro banasems can 'bum dag kyang yongs su smin par byedal/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston
par byed pa 'am/ 'dzan par byed pa 'am/ sbyin par byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib
pa'am/ ral bar byed paparagyur ba ma yin no// 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar bya ba'ang ma yin no// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de na 'dod pa'ikhams
nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yani/ 'dod pa'i khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'gro ba' byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams su 'jog par byed pa ma yin no//
gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'gro bar byed pa ma yin/ gzugadas med pa'i khams su 'jog pa byed pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin//
'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// bzod pa pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed
ba ba ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yane/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha mol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no//
nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// / rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin par byed
lhopa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// rang byang chub sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa sbyin par byed pa ma yin 'di'i

lci bar byed pa ma yin no// rnam pa thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin bar byed pa ma yin/ 'do'abar byed pa ma yin no// 'ab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sIn nga 'a
za0 byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams smin par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa la/
yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams spyan par byed pa ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa ma yin no// yang dag pa' rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par
byed pa ma yin/ 'dor b.rad pa ma yin no// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin// 'dus ma lus kyi khams sbyin par byed pa ma yin no//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor 'daltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ) de bzhin gugashegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings na
gnas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// mang chos kyi dbyangs de dperjed ngas po med pa dang/ yongs su nyams par byed pa ma yin no// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil
na'akhod cing ga zha'i sgra ring zhes bton nas/ lha'i me tog ud la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+madakar po dag gtorate/ tshig 'di skad ces a la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor
lo gnyis pa bskolab mthong ngo zhes 'dzarato// der lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag gis ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan
pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i/ 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di ni dang po ma
yin gnyis pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang mang bskorab r bya ba'i phyir 'am/ ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyire bar gnas pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la da ltar shes rab kyi pha khol tu phyin ba 'di chos gang la'ang bskor bar bgyi ba 'am/ ldog par bagyi ba'i slad du
te ba gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos pa ma mchis ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa na shes rab kyi pha rol

phyin pas stong de bzhin du sbyin pa ri pa rol tu phyin pa bar du sbyin pa'i ba rol du phyin pa'i bar gyis stong/ de bzhin du nang stong ba nyade ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong/ phyi stong pa nyid na phye stong pa nyid

kyis stong phyi nang stong ba nyid ni phyi nang stong ba nyid kyis stong/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar na dengos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran
pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ) 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcus stong/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong/ sa sores bo naso so' skye ba nyid kyis stong/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bun lon cig phyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras thun phyi ma 'ong bar dras bus stong/ dgra bcom pa nyid
ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong/ 'bubyang chub na red byang chub kyis stong/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid na byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de ni rnam
pa tha: sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshod ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi keshes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha mol du phyin ba chen po lags te/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'ang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems
dba'asams dpar chen po rnams na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyane ba 'di la brten nas sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa' rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
bgyid kyang/ sgor bar bgyid pa ram/ ldog par bgyid pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis te/ chos gang gis kyang chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'am 1 skor bar bgyid ba ma
'u// mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la chos gang shor bar bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa'i chos 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis/
tho pa'i slad du'o// de cherisAdang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtanamangon par ma grub pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'daltar stong pa nyide chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa las/
ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa ni chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa na chos gang yang skor bar bgyid pa 'am/
ldog par bgyid pa ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ 'dogs pa dang/ 'jog pa dang/ rnam par 'byed pa dang/
! rnam par 'grel pa dang/ gsal bar bgyid pa dang/ 'jug par bgyid pa dang/ 'chad par bgyid pa de na shis sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa yongs su dag pa lags so// shes

rab kyi pha khol du phyin pa bshad pa 'di ni sus kyang bshad pa ma mchis la/bstan pa'angam mtshos ste/sus kyang 'dris pa dang ma mchis/sus kyang mngon sum du bgyis pa 'ang ma mchis lags so// de la ni gang yang mya ngan las
'das pa ma yin te/ chos bstan pa 'di la ni yon gnas su gagyi ba gang yang ma mchis lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ byed pa po dang byed pa med pa'i le'u
zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyinab 'di no'i rol phyin pa mtha' yas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam banyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu
phyin pa 'ad na dben pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rje ba ma
mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nim mchis pa lags
so ba com ldan 'dosakyis bka' stsal pa// mang med pa dang lus med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nem mkha' lta bu lags
so bka' stsal pa// dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa dmigs su medwapa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa radin besdod du ma mchis pa lags so//
bka' stsal ba/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa dmigs su med ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal
pa tshor ba dang/ 'du shig dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mchib ma mchis pa//
lags so/ dbaka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'ong ba med ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rad ni mi bas pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad gtan zad cing byang ba'i phyir ro// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di na skye ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
pha rol du phyin pa 'din byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// byed pa po dmagis su med ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha khol tu phyin pa 'di ni rebs pa po ma mchis pa
lags so/ bka' stsal pa/ 3 chos thams cad bem po de yin pa'i phyi'i ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'chi'apho
dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa thol tu phyin ba 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das pa thol du phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brag cha lta bu lags
so bka' stsal pa/ sgra dang rna ba dmagos su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la thol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ mi leng dang bzhin dmigs su
med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pa thol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so// bka' stsal la/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rdzol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags
so/ bka' stsol ba// nyon mongs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ nyon
gongs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ gos ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/
dbatsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags se// bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// btsun ga
bcom ldan 'das pha zol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// rlom sems thams cad yang dag pa bcom pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyira'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad ni 'dod chags dang//
ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'din kun nas ldang ba ma mams pa lags so// bka'
sul pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi mngon ma/
dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom lde 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa/
bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi sdang ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa ) zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug
'tham mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha spol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka'
stsal pa/ kun tu rtog pa ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sems can yod pa ma yin pa'i
phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sba nga du ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan
'das pa krol tu phyin pa 'di'i mtha' gnyis dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal ba/ mtha' gnyis rnam par sas pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni the ma dad pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dri ba med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so// bka'
stsal pa// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so// bka'
stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad damigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di nid ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad
nyer gsum
ku// dmis su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus pa sol tu phyin pa 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid

kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa nyid kyi phyira'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyen ba 'di/
ba ni sdug bsngal ba lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad paskyob pa med pa nyid kyi phyir 'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha zol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos

thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigabasu ma dpa nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das pha chol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad ldog pa med pa nyid kyi phyira'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la 'ol tu phyin pa 'daM
nang stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa )nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa phu'i di

'das pha phol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ bka' stsal ba/stong ba nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med ba nyid kyi phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen bo stong pa/
nyid lags so// bka' stsal ba/ chos thams cad dmigs su med ba nyid kyi phyiraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha lol du phyin pa 'di ni den dam pa stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal ba/
don dam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha spol du phyin pa 'di na 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal ba/ 'dus ma byas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin
'di na mtha' las 'a das pa stong pa nyid lags so// bkar stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lo du phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med
pa stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ thog dang tham med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bka'
stsal pa/ dor ba med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyira'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin dmigs su/
med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'as pha thol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa ) nang dang phyi'i rkyes dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir// btsun pa bcom ldan

'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid lags so// bka' stsal ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa
'di na dran pa nyel ba gzhag pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ lus dang/ tshor ba dang/ soms dang/ chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcomaldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
yang dag pa stong ba nyid lags so/ )bka' stsal ba/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rjes rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu lun pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
lags so// bka' stsal pa// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan radas pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so// bka' stsal ba/ dbang po lnga dmigs
su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan las pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so// bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus pa rtsol
sa0/ du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so// bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam lags so//
bka' stsal pa ) 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'dan stong pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/
dbon pa'i rnam pa dmigasas mad pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smo na pa ma mchis pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ smon pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
rnam par thar pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar ba brgyad dmag sa su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'ad na snyoms par 'jug pa lags so//
bka' stsal pa: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyiraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/
sa su dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims legs so/ bka' stsal pa/ ral pa'i tshul khrims dmags su yod pa'i
phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di na bzod pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lo du phyin pa rad ni brtsom ragrus lags so// bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad ni bsam gtan
lags so// bka' stsal pa// rnam par gal nga pa'i soms dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so// bka' stsal pa/
'chal pa'ishes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ba lol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyis mi brdziba'i/
phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha mol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba med pa'i phyira'o/ 3lam kyi rnam par
ts+tso shes pa de la zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ shis pa thams cad la chags pa
med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na hUMng rje chen po lags so// bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su ma gtang ba nyid kyi phyi

[n btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha khol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lags so// bka' stsal pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i/
phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ skad thams cad du de bzhin du gsung ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sbyar ba'i phyir ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pad dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags so// bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro// de nas stong gsum gyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dod pa na sto palelha rnams dang/ gzugs rnams na spyod pa'i lha gang dag ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i ma tog dang/ sos dang/ rgya sos dang/ sbe
ka dang/ a ka runag be ri phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig
du 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khed nas kyang/ 'dod pa na sprod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'abu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/
@#/ shes rngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ngo shad pa lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha u0f7cla tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba lags/ de skad/
zla ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin no// lha dgashis

rab kyi pha rgol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// lha dag de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mngon par 'du byed pa yod
pa'i maNon nyid dang/ na ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ dngos
po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// lha dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi don du ming dang brda dang/ gdags pa
rgyudang/ bsnyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs par zad de/ lha dag de dag don dam par ni ma yin te/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dkrug par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir/

'di ltar lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'a jig rten yang de'i mtshan nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dag de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid rab tu mishes ) mtshan nyid kyis mtshon

nyid med pa'ang rab tu mi shes mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid rab tu ma shes/ mchon nyid med pas mtshan nyid med pa'ang rab tu mi shes te/ lha dag de ltar na mtshan nyid dang/ mtshan nyid med pa dang/
mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang/ de gnyis ka gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang/ gang shes par 'gyur ba mesrid pa'i phyir ro// lha dag mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma lan/
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams kyis mngon par 'dus lus pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pas mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus lus pa ma yin/

phyi stong pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis mngon pa 'dus byas pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po mad pa'i ngo bo nyid stobangaha kyi bar gyis mngon par
'dus byas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas/ de bzhin du sbyarate/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis mngon par 'dus byas pa ma yin no/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni
mi rnams sam/ mi ma yin pa rnams sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa rnams sam/ khog pa med pa rnams sam/ 'jig rten pa rnams sam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams sam/ 'dus
byas rnams sam/ 'dus ma byas rnams kyis kyang ma yin no// yang lha dag gang la la zhag 'di skad du/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhes zer na/ cikhyed de la yang dag par sa u0fb1bas yang
[go]da/ dag par sAsagam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mtshad nyid lags so zhes yang dag bar mi su lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
zla 'das nam mkha' ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du/ mtshan nyid gang dang yang ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te/ ma mchis shing dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyo da pa3lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbyings ni gnas panyid yin te de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs paro sangs rgyas
pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ lha de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mtshan
nying kang dag mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pas ) chos rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa ma mchis par gzigasapa 'jug pa dang ) de pa'in gshegs pas mtshan nyid/
gang la gnas nas 3 chags pa thams cad las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid 'di dag ni zab lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ gang la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi sku tshe rabs dang nga/
chub sems dpar gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa lngakhas shing/ sku tshe 'ad lan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la rnam
ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang/ mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams kyi spyod yul/ shes rab kyi pa zol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ngo mtshar lags so// chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa ni gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang ) 'du shes dang
'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa shes pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang ) de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
dang/ bzod pa'i pha sngol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha tshol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa nas//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid thugs su chud pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
shubya/ gtong lha dog gzugs kyi man nyid nigazugs su rung ba ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med pa maNon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin du tshor ba ni
mang ba'i mtshan nyid/ 'du shes ni 'dzin pa mchon nyid/ 'du byed rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid ) rnam pa 'das pa ni so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin gshegru
pas maNaMn nyid med par mngon par tshogs par sangs rgyas so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par tshod

par sangs rgyas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa na yongs su gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/ bsam gtan gyi ba rol du phyin pa ni rnam par ma g.yong ba'i mtshan nyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de ) de ni
de bzhin gshegs pas maN+NaM na nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bsam gtan bzhi dang/ de bzhin du tshad med pa bzhi dang/ de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jub

pa bzhi ni nye bar zhi b.limtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su cu rtsa bdun ni nges par byung ba'i mtshan ted do/

[/]de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid na rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid ) rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni 'dzin/

pa med pa'i mtshan nyid 3 rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni don du gnyer ba med pa'i mtshan nyid btang snyoms ni 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par brgyad na ma 'phrog pa'i mtshan nyid//

bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su bcu ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni zhum pa med par mtshan nyide/ snying rje chen po ni stong brtse ba'i mtshan nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad

ni zil kyis mi non pa'imtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos thams cad ji lta ba ba la sgrig
pa med pa'i mtshamanyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// lha dag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa med par gzigs pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rig 'bo ra la bka' stsal

pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rdzol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams skyod pa dang/ rten par byed pa yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa shes/
ba kyi pha rdzol tu phyin pa 'di la nye bar brten nas gnas so// nye bar brten nas kyang shes rab kyi pha mol tu phyin pa'i chos de la bkur stir mdzad ) bla mar mdzad/ ri mor mdzad/
mchod par mdzad de/ rab 'byorade ltar dam pa'i chos shes rab kyi pha lol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa bkur ster mdzad/ bla ma'i mdzad ) ri mor mdzad/ mchod par mdzad pa yin no/
de rtse'i phyogs zhen/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byang la ) de bzhin gshegs pa ni shis rab/
kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa tsho ba yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni byas pa gzo ba dang// byas pa tshor ba ro zhes yang dag par s+yA bas
sA na de ni byas pa gzo ba dang ) byas pa chor ba yang dag par s+yA bas sa pa yin no// rab 'byor ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa gzo ba dang )bas pa tshor ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di
de bzhin gshegs ba theg pa gang gis byon pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lam gang gso bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa de dang//
lam de la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun kho nar bkur stir mdzad/ bla maramar mdzod ) ri mor mar mdzad/ mchod par mdzad cing/ de bzhin du rjes su 'dzin cing rjes su bskor ba mdzad pa sta rab
'byo ra de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshorab yin par blta bar bya'o// rab 'abyor gzhan yang byed pa po med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dam pa'i chos byas pa med par/

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin du lus mod pa'i phure chos thams cad byas pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ las 'byor shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa zab mo 'dal brten nas/
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gze ba dang/ byas pa tshor ba yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'dinyid la brten nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par dz+dzogs pa'isangs rgyas chos thams cad la byas pa med par mang par makhyen pa 'jug cing rang bzhin dang brdas ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs de kyang
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs ba bskyed pa dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no// de skadaces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dis 'deltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa dang/ mig med pa'o zhes bka' stsal pa lags na//
'o na ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gangashegs pa rnams skyed ba dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang 1 bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan
@#/ pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te 2 chos thams cad shes pa mang ba dang/ mig med pa'o zhes ji skad stsas pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ji
zla lta na chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa dang/ mig med pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rten med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar rnams grangs des na/ tshes
thams cad na shes pa med pa dang/ mig med pa yin te 3 rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no//
de yang gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyi ston pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du
gong ma bzhin du sbyar te ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ba du ma mthong ba'i phyir ston par byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams skad pa dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/ )gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs ma mthong ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston
par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du phyi ltar na tshor ba dang ) ji ltar na 'du shes dang/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnams ) ji ltar na rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi khol du phyin

pa 'di ston par bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyarate/ ji ltar narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mthong ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa bgyid :
pa lags/ bcom ldan das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam pa shes pa ma 'byang na/ de ltar na gzugs ma mthong ba'i phyir/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du 'ad ltar tshor ba la dmigs pa dang/ 'du shes la dmegaso pa dang/ 'du byed rnams la dmigs pa dang/ rnam par shes
pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa me 'byungan/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyarate/
'daltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa ma 'byung na/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyade ma mthong ba'i phyir/ bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
'jig rten ston par byed pa yin te/ rab 'byorade ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa red de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyad pa dang )'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no/

'ba'abyor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ajig rten rnams la phung po lnga stong pozhes rjod par byed do// de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la sku mched bcu gnyis dang ) khams bco brgyad stong ngo
zhes rjod do// de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug

zla pa bzhi stong ngo zhes rnyed de// de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba stong ngo zhes rjod do//

da bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du stong ngo zhes rjod do// de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la nang song pa nyid stong ngo zhes rjod do// de

bzhin du sngarate/ dngos po med pa'i de bored stong pa nyid kyi b.radu stong ngo zhes rjod do// de bzhin du 'jig rten rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi stong ngo zhes rjod do// de bzhin du gong ma bzhin dusbyar te/

'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi b.radu stong ngo zhes rjod ngo// 'jig rten rnams la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes rjod do// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha la
du phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brtenanas/ 'jig rten rnams la phung po lnga stong ngo zhes ston te/ 'jig rten yang stong ngo zhes khong du chud cing rig la kun du shes shang/ 'jig rten dag

tsalha la 'ang de kho na bzhin brjod par byed de/ rab 'byorade ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed ba dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes/

gab kyi pha khol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes ston par byed do// 'jig rten stong par ston pa de dag gang nan/ phung po lnga'i

'jig rten de stong par ston no// de bzhin nga skye mched bcu gnyis kyi 'jig rten de stong par ston to// de bzhin du khams bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten de stong bar ston to// dbazhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyarate/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten de stong pa ston par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang/ 'jig rten rnams ston par byed pa yin no//
rab 'byor ba zhan yang shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten rnams bsam gyis ma khyab par ston par

byed do// 'jig rten gang gis bsam gyis ma khyab pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis ma khyab par ston to// de bzhin du sbyar
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab par ston te/ rab 'byor do ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyed pa dang/ 'jig rten
rnams ston bar byed pa la no/ rab 'abyor gzhan ye shes zab kyi bcol tu phyin 'di de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas rnams la 'jig/

rtan zhes bya ba dang/ bod de kyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston to// 'jig rten zhi zhes bya ba nas ) stobazhes bya ba'i bar du ston bar byed ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyadekyi bar du zhes bya ba ston to// de bzhin du lung bo lnga nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi par du ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha phol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams skyed pa dang/ 'dzage rten rnams ston pa la byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag b.rardzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams la/ 'jig rten 'di la 'jig rten du du shes ba med ba dang/ 'jig rten pa phol du 'jig rten du 'du shes pa med par 'jig rten gyi 'du shes ston par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
u0fc4 raltarachos gang dag gis 'jig rten 'dir shes pa la/ 'jig rten pha rol tu shes par 'gyurab 'i chos rnams med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dbcom ldan
'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan
cha 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ mdzad pa dpag tu ma mchis pas nye bar gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bur de de

bzhin no// ji skad sas pa de bzhin te/ 'ashes rab kyi pha sngol tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa chen pos nye bar gnas pa yin zhing/ de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa bsam gyis mi
khyab pa dang/ mdzad pa gzhal du med pa dang/ mdzad pa ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mdzad pa chen po dang mdzad ba
ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ib kyis te brngaganas pa yin nan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa chen bo ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta sta
sams can thams cad bslab par bya ba'i don dang/ yongs su ma gtang ba bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad byed brtaganas ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du/
phyin pa 'di mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyi mi khyab pa ni/ 'di lta sta/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa/

nyid dang/ rang byung nyid dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
bya// rnams kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis ma khyab pas nye bar gnas pa yin no// rab 'byoraja ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas pa yin/
tho zhe na rab 'byor 'gro ba lnga po dag na so mas can du bsdu bar bsdus pa la/ gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dam/ de bzhi ni gshigs pa nyid dang/ rang byung nyidadam/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam pa'ang ) gzhal bar nus pa'i sems can ni 'ga' yang med la/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa maslu yin te/ 'as 'byor rnam grangs des na//
shes rab kyi pha spol tu phyin ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa gzhal du med pas nye bar gnas pa yin no// rab
'byor lta rna shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mdzad pa dpag tu med pas nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor dbag tu med pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang/ rang byung nyid dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin te/ rab 'byor 'gro ba lnga po dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa
la gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang sams mnyam ba'i sems can ni 'ga' yang med na/ lhag pa ltag la yod de/
de bzhin gshegs ba dgra btem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang/ bshes sngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu phye ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab/
kyi pha sngol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'isangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa dpag tu med pa nas mdzad pa'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis nye ba'i
gnas pa yin no// de skad ces bka' sul pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
ci yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang/ rang byung nyid dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis ma khyabab dang/ gzhal
ngum mchis pa dang/ dpag tu ma mchis pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
ji skad slas pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
nyid dang/ rang byang nyid dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no// 'ab 'byor 'di ni gzhal du med pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas
nyide dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang/ rang byung nyid dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no// rab 'byor 'di ni debagatu med pa yin te//
rad lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang/ rang byung nyide dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin no// rab 'byor 'di
ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ 'dra lta sta/ yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasanyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang/ rang byung nyid dang/ thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs kyang basam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ gzhal du med pa dang/ dpag tu med pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
yin no// rab 'byor dbazhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ gzhal du med pa dang/ dbag tu med/
pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyarato/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang bsam gyis ma khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin no//
