rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/ de dag la nisoms dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med cing ma dmigs so/ sa 'byor
gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'ang
bsam gyis ma khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyarate ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang bsam gyis ma khyab pa nas/
mimanyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te mad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'dus ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dang/ dpag tu ma mchis pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags te/ ma mchis pa lags//
de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dang/ dpag tu ma mchis pa dang/ mi ma nyag
pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du lags te/ ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis ma khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'i bar du
lags de/ ma mchis pa lags ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la'ang tshad med de/ de'i phyi gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ ma mnyam pa dang
mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa shes pa'ang tshad med de/ de'i phyi'i rnam par shes b.rang bsam

gyis mi khyab ba nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do// rab ' blo bde bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang tshad med de/ de'i phyi'i rnam pa thams cad ma bye
ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te med do// gsol pa/ ci'i slad du gzugs la tshad ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/
'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la tshad ma mchis pa lags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad mamachis pa lags/ bcomaldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ba nas/ ma mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/ de'i phyi'i gzugs tshad med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te rnam ba

thams cad mkhyenab nyid kyakhedu bsam kyis ma khyab ba nas/ ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin te/ de'i phyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kya bedu tshad med do// rab 'abyor rad de snyam du sems
bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba'i bar gang yane pa de la gzugs dmages su yod snyamamam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigasasu yod snyam
mam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mamachis lags so// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i snadu yin no// rab 'byor
'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste ) bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ gzhal du med ba dang/ dpag tu med pa dang ) ma mnyam ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de
bzhin gshags pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa ) bsam pa dang bra' ba/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal ba dang bral ba/ dbab tu med pa// dpag pa dang bral ba/ ma mnyam ba dang

mnyam pa med pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bral ba yin no// rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba de ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i tshig bla dgas yin no// gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba de ni
gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin no// dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de ni dbag du med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ rab 'khyer rnam sras des kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
chos rnams ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa nas/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du yin no// rab 'byor dper na nam mkha' na bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang/ ba mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no//
rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ni bsam gyi mi khyab ba dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dag yin te/ de dag kyang lha dang/ ma dang/
lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ bgrang bar ma nus so// de bzhin du dpag tu med ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa de spyi
[D ]bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ gzhal du med pa dang/ dpag tu med pa dang//
gemanyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u'adi bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med bar zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma nyis brgya ni len ba med par zag pa rnams
las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen drug brgya dang/ dge bsnyen ma sum brgya na chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral pa skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' nyis stong gis ni mi
skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag kyang bskal pa bzang bo 'di nyid la lung bstan to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ yon tan gyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa
rdzogs so// 1shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba bam po nyi shu ba// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan ba rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi ba 'ol tu phyin ba 'di ni zag pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa
lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyib gzhal du ma mchis pa dang )bgyi ba dpag tu ma mchis pa dang/ mamanyam ba dang mnyam pa'i brgyabs gnas pa'
sa de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bco ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byel 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'ashes rab kyi ba lo

tu phyin pa 'di na bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas ba nas ) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyi bya bas nye bar gnas pa yan no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha

thol tu phyin pa 'dir ba rdzol tu phyin pa la 'dus ba dang/ nang stong gnyid 'dus pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'dus pa dang/ de bzhanedu
sbyar to/ 'phags pa'am yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du 'dus pa dang/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus pa dang/ rnga'abyor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ba

'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'dus pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dbaran rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi cho laspyod pa thob pa'i rgyal po'idagos padang/
rgyal po'i khyab gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni bka' la gtogs pa'am la yod cing/ blon po chen porim la yod pa yin te/ rgyal bo ni bya ba de dag la/ snying las chung ba dang khu bor ba yin no//
rngab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ 'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

chos rnams gang dag ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi ye pol tu phyin par 'dus shing/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin ba na de dag gi bya ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des na/
shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bye bag chen pos nye bar gnas pa ane zhing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni me mnyam ba dang mnyam pa'i bya ba'i bar dang ]gzugs la yongs su 'dzani pa/
med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam pa28shis ba la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen ba
med pa dang/ de bzhin du gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par zhen ba med par log gnas pa yin no// de skad
( ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo lA gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dagazugs
la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mnges shing mngon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ jaltaran tshor pa dang/ ji ltar na 'dushes dang/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnams dang/ ji ltar na rnam
bkra shis pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis shing mngon par zhen ba ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su 'dzan pa ma mchis/
shangamangon par zhen pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
'byor cakhyod kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba 'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i gzugs de yang dag par rjesasu mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci khyed kyis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba 'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba de dang/ 'dushes
de dang/ 'du byed de dag dang/ rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
rab 'byor ci khyod kyis gangashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba 'am ) mngon par zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi bar de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol
ba btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ngas kyang gang shes rab
'u@#// kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba 'am/ mngonab zhen par bya ba'i bar de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// de bzhin du ngas kyang gang shes rab kyi pha phol tu phyin pas
yongs su gzung ba 'am/ mngon bar zhen pa'u bya ba'i tshor ba de dang ) 'dushes de dang/ 'du byed de dag dang/ rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// rab 'byorade bzhin
dungs kyang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba 'am/ mngon par zhen par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag bar rjes su ma mthong ngo// rab 'byor de lta
'gaM bas na byang chub sems dpa' shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la yongs su gzung bar ma bya/ mngon par zhen par ma bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi ba pal yongs su gzung bar mi bya/ mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di/
skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing mthong bar dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ste/ brtags par mi nus shing/ rtog dge'i spyod yul
ma lags la/ zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig brnga bgyi ba lags so/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub semaMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi
ba rol tu phyin ba zab mo 'di thos nas mos bar 'gyur ba de dag na sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yo sa su zin pa
dag lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tsho stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'o brang bar gyur cing/
de bzhin du chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba dang/ brgyad pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir ma 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dag tu gyur kyang/ de
dag gi shes pa gang lags pa dang/ sbyong ba gang lags pa bas ni/ gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzab mo 'de la nyin gcig tsam zhig bzod pa 'am/ 'dod pa 'am/ 'jal ba/
'am 'i bar rtog par bgyid na/ de'i shes pa dang/ stong ba de nyid ches mang ba rnams kyi snga ma dad pas rjes su 'brang pa nas/ rangasangs rgyas kyi bar de dag gi shes pa dang stong ba nam lags

so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta' dad pas rjes su 'brang pa rnams kyi shes pa dang stong ba gang lags pa dang/ de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi bgyi shes ba dang/ long ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ma skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i chos la bzod pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag dang ! gzugs
[z]/ @#// na spyod pa'i lha de dag la bka' stsal pa[） ]lhadag legs so legs so// de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la spyi
zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing/ thos nas kyang mos par gyul/ mos nas kyang yagira'adri'am/ yi ge pa'adzrar 'jug pa 'am/ de bzhin du 'chang zhang ston pa nas/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bshes su tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo da na na nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas kyi ye shes kyis chos/
myud yongs su mya ngan las 'da' b.rang sgra'i/ nyan thos kyi thog ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la bskal pa 'am/
bskal pa las lhag par spyod pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyogs na/ lha dag 'daltar dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams nas/ dgra bcom pa'i bar dag dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos
zlog gang la bslab par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rnams kyi chos gang bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas pa'i yang dag phul gyi chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha de dag/
gis btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pe rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ) 'di lta ste/ shes zab kyi
khog tu phyin pa 'di ni pe la du phyin ba ga zhal du ma mchis pa dang/ ba rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma mnyam ba dang mnyam pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
shes rab kyi ba go tu phyin pa zab mo 'ad la bslabs nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang/ brgyad kha rnams dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang/ phyir
ma 'ong ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams phung po'i lhag ma chod pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i debungesaM su nges par 'byung legs so// 'di la bslabs nas byang chub
sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs
su longasasumya ngan las 'da' yang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo red la ni bro pe 'kha/ gang bar mngon pa ma mchis lags so zhes ched du brjod pa chod du brjod do//
donas lha de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
[2] ]]nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thad nus 'dong ngo// de dag hacang ma 'onge bzhag tu rdzu 'phrul rgyas dong nas mi snang bar gyur to// de la 'dod pa na sprod ba'i lha'i bu de dag
na 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do// gzugs na spyo da pa'i lha gang dag yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa la 'byor/
gyis 'di skad cis gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i glog pa pa'i gang zag gangashes rab kyi pha khol du phyin pa 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag du mos par 'gyur zhing )
gong du'ang ya gi 'dri ba dang/ 'dzan ba dang ) 'changab dang/ kun chub par byed ba dang rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la bgyidapa' ber du bgyid pa zhig lags na/ de gang nas shi 'phos nas
'disAs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ) tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
gang shes thab kyi pha rgol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing/ gong durang yi ger 'dri ba dang/ 'dzan pa dang ) 'chang ba dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/
rtag tutshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar byed pa dang gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zab mo 'di thos pa'i phyi nIn du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor dper na ba
jus ba belugasar pa'i rjes su 'brang ba byed ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dba'i theg pa pa gangashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing !
gong du'ang yi ge 'a ba dang ) 'dzin pa dang ) 'chang ba dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ rtag tu tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar dubyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
de ni mi rnams kyi nang ban nas paga' thos nas mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byo gad ltar byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i gang zag des/ sngon gyi tshe rabs dag
tung shes rab kyi ba la du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas bzung zhing bcangs la/ kun chub par byas pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas ba'i bar du byas pa yimaning/ gong du'ang yo gar bris
te glegs bamadu chud par byas nas me tog dang ) bya ma dang/ mar ma dang/ bdug pa dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dag gis bkur
ste byas shing/ de bzhin du btsun pa byas/ ri mor byas te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs nas/ mi rnams kyi nang du skyes ba yin no// de skad/
ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dang 'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang
'u// yon tan de dag nyid da ldan la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes la/ shes

[D ]'ab kyi pha chol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag tu mos par bgyid la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang/ la goma'adri stsol ba dang/ de bzhin du 'dzin pa dang/ 'chadab dang tshul bzhin du/
rgyu yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba ltams lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa 'bu 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor bung chub sems
dba'i theg pa ba'i gang zag gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstun bkur byas nas ) de de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes la/ shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa
zab mo 'di thos nas/ thos ma thag du mos bar byedal/ mos nas kyang ge ra 'drib dang/ ager 'brir 'jug ba dang/ de bzhin du 'a dzAn kha dang/ 'chang ba dang/ kun chub pa' byed ba
dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'ang yod do// de ca'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag des/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha lo du phyin pa zab mo 'di khes la/ de bzhin du bzubazhi bcas te/ kun chub par byas pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed ba'i bar du byas pa yin te
de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de nas shi 'phos nas 'di le nyis ba yin ba'i phyir// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dag tu/
shes rab kyi pha khol tu phyin kha zab mo 'di thos shinge/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa'i bgadu byas pa te/ de tshun chad las ma dge ba bsags pa zad par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang/ shes rab kyi ba la tu phyin pa bsgoms pa'i rgyas ma rnyems dang skal ba mnyam par skyes ba de'ang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par 'ge par
bya'o/ de ci'i phyin na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dga' ldan gyiganas su skyes pa des/ byang chub sams dba'asams dpa' chen po
byams pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dris shang yongs su zhus pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis ston gyi
tsharabs dag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la/ chos gsal ba'aston pa de la yongs su ma dris shing/ yongs su ma zhus pa 'dare skyes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rtsol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na som nyi ted du 'gyur te/ the tshom nyid du 'gyur ro// sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu
bsam gtan gyi pha lotu phyin pa dang ) de bzhin dubartson 'grus kyi ba khol tu phyin pa dang/ bzodapa'i pha mol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i/

ba latu phyin pa'i bar gyi zab mo 'di thos la/ chos gsal bar ston pa de lam drise shing/ yongs su ma zhus pa 'di u0f7a skyes ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zub mo 'di thos na som lta nyid du 'gyur
te the tshom nyid du 'gyur ro// sems zhum pa nyid du 'gyuralo// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dag tu nang stong pa nyid dang/

de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang/ de bzhan du phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'ad blos la/ chos gsal bar ston pa de lam dris shing/ yongs su ma zhus pa

'dir skyag pa don/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la som te nyid du 'gyur zhing/ the tshom nyid du 'gyur te/ sams zhum pa nyid du 'gyur/

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tshe'abs dag tu dran pa lta bar gnag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang bo/
lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang ) rnam par thar ba brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas
ba'isnyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang/ de bzhinagashegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar duthosal/ chos gsal bar ston ba de la ma dris shing/ yongs su

ma zhus pa 'dire skyes pa de ni/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyidel som nyi nyid du gyur cing ) yid brtul ba nyid dang/ thatshom nyid
du 'gyur te/ sams zhum pa nyid du 'gyura'o// rab 'abyoragazhan yang byung chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis sngon gyi tsha bas dag tu shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo/
'di nyid thos la/ 'di lta sta/ kib gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'i mnyimalngar yang nyams su ma slangs ngang/ ma bsgoms ba ni/'di lta ste khyim gcig gam/ gnyis
sa[« ]gsum mam/ bzhi ma/ nyim lngar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'phrog par 'gyur gyi de'i 'og tun the tsom gyis 'phrog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor

nan tanasnyingabor mi byed pa'i gang khrag ni chos de dag ma bsgoms shing/ nan tan ma byas pas de ltaba'agyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni theg pa la zhugs
nas ka ngo bo ma 'an pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin ba ma yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas mang po ba bstan bkur byas pa ma yin pa dang/ des na shes rab kyi ba gol tu phyin ba zab mo/
'ad yi geram bris shing ma bzungal ma bcas te/ kun chub par ma byas pa dang/ ma bklags pa dang/ kha don dum byas pa dang/ lung ma nod ba dang/ tshul

kyi bzhin du yid la ma byas shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang ma bslabs pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin ba dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rgol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs pa dang/ de bzhin du nang stong ba nyid la ma bslabs ba nas/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong
waM banyid dang/ dngos bo med pa'i de de nyid stong ba nyid kyi ba la ma bslabs pa dang/ dran ba lu brngagazhag pa rnams la ma bslabs ba dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyam
paba'ajug pa dgu dang/ de bzhin ga shigs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bal ma slabs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i

thag ba pa'i gang zag de nas rab kyi pha khol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi 'dri zhing/ yi ger 'brir ma 'jug pa dang/ ma 'dzin pa dang/ ma'achang ba dang/ kun chub par mi byed pa dang/ mi klog kha dang/

kha ton du mi phyed ba dang/ lung mi nod ba dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la med de/ ji skar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ong nyams su mi len la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo/
'ase sams can la'ang phan mi 'dogs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi ba la sams can rnams yang dag par 'dzin du ma 'jug ba de nas gnyis po 'di lta sta/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
sangs rgyas kyi sar shes pa la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltarades ni shes rab kyi pha sngol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ge ma bris shang 1 yi gi 'drir ma bcug/ ma bzus/ ma bcas
kun chub par ma byas/ ma bklags/ kha ton ma byas/ lung ma nod/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rgol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ji skad bstan pa la nan tan du ma
byas pa phyir 'o/ rab 'byoradaper na rgyamatsho'i gru 'am/ gru bo chacha ga cing zhig na/ de ni mi gang dag 'tshob ra'adod pa dag shing leb dag gam/ shang dag gam/ rgyal ba dag nam )mi'o
dag la mi 'du'ange 'a dzani par ma byed pa de dag ni) rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin pa kho na' chiba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dparan rgya mtsho'i gru 'am/ gru bo chachag cing
zhig na/ de ni gang dag 'tsho bar 'dod pa dag kahangeleb dag gam/ gang dag gam/ rgyal pa dag ga ma/ mi 'od g la'ajo zhing 'dzan par byed ba de dag ni/ bde ba dang 3 bde legs su ma smras
ma nyams ba ra rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i gang zag gang dag shes rab kyi/
pha rol tu phyin pa za mos yodad pa tsam dang dgar ba tsam dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma 'dri zhing/ yi ger 'drim 'jug pa dang/ ma'adzan ba dang/
ma 'chang ba dang/ kun chub par ma byed pa dang/ ma klog pa dang/ kha ton du ma byed pa dang/ lung nod b.ram byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma byed cing/ shes rab kyi pha rol
du phyin pa zab mo 'di ji skad bstan pa la nan tan du ma byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma phyin par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rasangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du byed pa
'gyur ro// rab 'byorabyang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag dud ba dang/ bzod pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dang ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/
tshos ba dang/ gtong ba dang/ blan med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'ang brtson ba mi gtong ba yod la/ shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang yi ger 'dri zhing/ de bzhin
du 'dzan pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton byedapa dang/ lung nod pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di skad bstan pa la nan tan du byed na/ da lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba'i theg pa pa de dag gis dad pa de dang/ bzod pa de dang dang ba de dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa
de dang/ 'dod pa de dang// mos pa de dang/ gtong ba de dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba de/ shes pa kyi pha la tu phyin bas longs su zin pa de ni 'a
zhing shin tu rgyas baba'agyu gal/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de dag ni sems can rnams yongs su smin pa ra
byas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag longs su dag par byas nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
'byor gzhan yang dparan skyes pa 'am/ bud med gcig bum pa so ma btang bas chu bcu badrasems na/ rgyas pa 'am bud med de ni mi mkhas ba'i rang bzhin can du 'ge bar ba ste/ bum

bso ma btang ba de ni range po mi thub par 'gyur te/ myur du sa khamal par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir dang/ swa ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
tshubs mas dpa'i thig pa ba'i gang zag gzhan dag kyang dad pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ dang ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa ma gtong ba phongs su zin kyang ga'on kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa dang bral zhinge/ thabs la mkhas ba dang thalan/ de dag de ba zhi/
du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
byin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang/ de bzhin du de dag nang stong pa dang/ phyi stong ba nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo cade stong pa nyid kyi bar dang bral zhing/ thabs la mkhas
pa dang bral ba dang/ de bzhin du de dag dran pa luba' gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par song pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang/ dbang po dang ) stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral ba dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ do dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud kyi bar du bsgom ba dang bral
zla zhing/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa dang bral pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bralan/ de dag bar ma do kho nar tshul bzhin
ma yin pas chos de dag rnam pa las nyams par 'gyura'o na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag gi bar ma do khanar tshul bzhin ma yin pas chos de dag las nyams
ba'agyur ba gang yin zhe na/ 'dilto ste/ nyan thos sam/rangs sa rgyas kyi sa 'o// rab 'byoradabaran skyes pa ma/ bud med gcig gis bum pa so btung bas 'di lta ste/ chu klung ngam
'bab tshu 'am/ mtsho 'am/ mtshe'am/ lteng ka'am/ khron ba nas chu tshun/ rgyas pa 'am/ bud med de chu rachub de ni mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya ste/ bum pa de
churab tug kyang zhig khar mi 'gyur te/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med des na ge ra dgar ba la bum pa des chu pa tu bar nus so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba rigang zag da pa/
la dad pa dang/ bzod ba dang/ drang ba dang/ lhag babasam pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ mos ba dang/ gtong ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa ma gtong bar da yod la/
de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang yang ma bral ba dang/ thabs la mkhas ba dang yang ma bral ba dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang yang ma bral bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ba
'byor de dag las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ gas kyi bu 'am/ gsakyi bu mo de dag na bsam gtan gyi pha log tu phyin pas longs su zin par rig par bya zhing ) de bzhin du
gsakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag na brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha phog du phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bya na[©]// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen bo de dag ni ba ma de kho
nar tshul bzhin ma yin pas nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ru chos de dag las nyams par ma 'gyur te/ ma skas ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor dpo'an rgya mtsho gru bcos legs ma byas ba ra rdzas kyi kun tu bkang nas rgya mtsho rgal bar byed na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i tshong pa de las
[@ ]gzhan pa ma mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can rnams kyis glu 'di bde ba dang/ bde legs su rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur te/ gru 'di ni bar ma do khe nar rgya mtsho 'jig bar 'gyur la// gru'ang
gzhan/ snod rdzas kyang gzhan/ thabs la ma mkhas pa'i tshong pa 'ang gzhan du 'gyur te/ tshul ma yin pas tum tes su da gyur ba la ge pa ra bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byed pa'i tshong pa
thabasal mi mkhas ba de dag na gnod ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing/ rin po che las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zagagang dag
la dad pa dang/ bzod ba dang/ dang bdang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa mi gtong ba yod
kyang de dag shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba dang/ glabs la mkhas pa dang bralan/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan
gyi kha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha lol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i ba rolatu phyin pas yongs su ma zin
dang de bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bkagyis yongs su ma zin par rig bar bu ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i gang zag de dag gi bar ma de kho
nar tshul bzhin ma yin pas chos de dag las nyams par 'gyur zhing ) gnod pa chen po dang ldan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa ba'isangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog rin
bo cha chen po dag las yongs su tams par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bar ma dor tshul bzhin ma yin bas/ chos de dag las nyams par
'gyur pa gang zhen/ 'alta ste/ nyan thos kyis ram/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yin no// rab 'byoradabar na rgya mtsho'i tshong pa mkhas ba'i rang bzhin can zhig gis rgya mtsho'i gru de legs
ba 'batsoms shing/ legs par bcos legs byas la ) le gas par byi dor byas nas ) rgya mtshor 'jug par byedal/ bcug nas kyang snod rdzas sna tshogs brdzas bar gyur na/ rab
'bor de'i phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshong pa de las gzhan kha mkhas pa'i rang bzhine can rnams kyis gru 'di ni rgya mtshor 'jig par mi 'gyur te/ tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can/
de dag gling gang du 'dod par gru 'di bde ba dang/ bde legs su phyin bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang cha ga dag la dad ba dang/ bzod
pa dang/ dang ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ 'a dod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa ma gtong ba'ang yod la/ de dag
klo kashes rab kyi pha khol tu phyin pa dang ma phrul ba dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems
dpal soms dba' chen po rnams kyis rigs kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan gyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul

rgyu khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha khol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par
gi par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar tshul ma yin pas chos de dag las nyams par mi 'gyur te/
ma sbas ma nyams par blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dpar naskyes bu la la zhage skyes nas lo nyis/
stong len te/ rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa zhig la/ de'i lus la yang 'di lta ste/ rlung las gyur ba 'a ma/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa ma
'dus pa las gyur pa 'am/ nad gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rab 'byor 'di ris mas du soms/ cim de gcig bu khri de las ldang bar nus sam mas+sa/ gsol lo/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mi des ltung rdo thogs su lags kyang/ 'on kyang des ni rgyud grug sa gti ga gam/ gnyis sam/
gsum mam/ de las lhag pa'i shul du mang po'i rjes thogs lags so// de'i slad du zhen/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltaram de ni rgas pa dang ) 'di ltar blo nad kyis nyams
skyod pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du ci ste byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag la dad pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ dang ba dang/ lhag

pa pes kha pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ bla na med pa lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu brtson ba mi gtong ba yod du zin kyang/ de dag shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa dang bral
zhing thapas la ma las ba dang bralan/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gas/ kye ma gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol
duphyin pa dang/ de bzhin du btson 'grus kyi la la tu phyin pa dang/ bzod ba'i pha rol du phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma
zin ba dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ gris kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bkra gyis longs su ma zin par rig pa bya ste/ rab 'byor byung chug sams
dpa theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag ni/ 'di lta sta/ tshul ma yin bas bar ma do kho nar nyan thos kyi sa 'om/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar chos de dag las nyams par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
! 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha grol tu phyin pa dang ]thabs lamakhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dpar na mi la la zhig skyes nas 'khortas stobalen te/ rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa de
nyid de'i lus la'ang 'di lta sta/ rlung las gyur pa ram/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'amed gang yang rung ba zhig byung la/ de dang khri de las
lta nga ba la 'dod pa dang mi stobs dang ldan lo gnyis shige lhags nas/ blo ga yas g.yon nasabarten te/ de la 'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur shog/ khyod gar dgar ba dang/ samos gar 'dod pa dang/
ga' dga' ba kho bo cag gis brten bas ji srid du gnas su ma phyin gyi bar du/ khyod 'gyel du dogs pa cung zad kyang mi 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i thig pa/
ba'i gang zag gang dag la dad pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ dang pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyug
tu rang brtson ba ma gtong ba yod la/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba yinan/ de'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyis ge kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pa thol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi bla srol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i la rtsol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi ba spol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin
ba'i pha rgol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par ga par bya ste/ byang chug soms dpa'
soms dpa' chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chupa mngon khar rdzogs bar sangs rgyas kyi/ bar ma do kho nar chos de dag las nyams pa mi 'gyur ro/ de ci'i phyibazhin
'di ltar de dag reshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i gang zag thabs la mi
mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'ad la byang chub sems dpa'i thegakha ba'i gang zagags kha cig dang po nyid du thabs la mi mkhas ba'i sbyin pa dag smin par byed do/ de/
bzhin du thabs lam mkhas pas tshul khrims srung bar byed cing/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom bar byed/ bsam gtan la mnyom pa 'jogo bar byed/ thabasal
mi mkhas bas shes rab sgom pa ra byed cing/ de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed cing/ sbyin pa ni 'di dag sbyin par bya'o// 'ad dag la ni sbyin
pa dag sbyin pa drakhya'o// de bzhin du bdag cag ni tshul khrims srung ba'o// bdag cag na tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ bdag cag ni bzod pa sgrub par byed pa'o/ bdag cag ni bzod ba
dang ldan pa'o// bdag cag ni brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa'o// bdag cag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// bdag cag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug bar byed pa'o/
bdag cag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// bdag cag ni shes rab sgom pa'o// bdag cag nishes rab dang ldan pa'osnyam du sems shing/ de dag sbyan ba rlomasams su byed ) sbyin pa des
rlom soms su byed/ sbyin pa la rlom sems su byed ) de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang ) shes rab rlom sams su byed )
shes rab des rlom sems su byed/ gshes bal rlom sems su byed do/ de dgan bdag tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gce'adzan par lhung ba'itsun pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ) bzod pa dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ 'ashes rab rnams kyis 'khor ba nyid rnam par 'phel bar byed do// de dag gaskya ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag las yongs su ma grol lo// de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'diltar sbyin pa'i pha khol du phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir na/ sbyin pa'ipha grol tu phyin pa ni pha rol phyin ba ma yin ba'i phyir ro//

de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha lo'on tu phyin pa dang ) brtson 'grus kyi ba sngol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi ba khol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la rnam pa rtog pa de dag yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bani pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyi'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' theg pa
ba'i gang zag dag zin ba sbyin par byed pa na dges pa'i ba mtha' mi shes na/ de dag sbyin pa'i ba rol tu phyin bas yongs su ma zin pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims srung
ba dang/ bzod pa sgom pa dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ bsam gtan la snyoms pa 'jug pa dang/ sha sa'ab sgom pa na dmigs ba'i pha mtha' ma reshesano )
de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa yin no// pha rel tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis yongs su ma zin na/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongasasu ma zin pa yin te/ de dag gi nyan thos kyi sa ram/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ltung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg
ba ba dag thabs la mi mkhas ba yin no/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mkhas pa dag yin te/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
rang sangs rgyas kyis mi ltung bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu 'dzin pa yin zhen 3 rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i gang zag dag dang po nyid
du thabs la mkhas pas bodag tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gi ra'adzan pa'am lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pas bdag/
tu 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gir 'dzinapar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab kyi bar du sgom par byed do// sbyin pa de dag sbyin pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ni sbyin pa dag/
sbyin par byed pa'o// sbyin pa ni 'di dag sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du bdag cag ni tshul khrims srung bar byed pa'o// bdag cag na tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// bdag
cag ni bzod pa sgrub pa byed pa'o// bdag cag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// ba dag cag ni brtsen ragrus rtsom par byed pa'o// bdag cag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o//
bdag cag ni bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed pa'o// bdag cag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o// bdag cag ni shes rab sgom bar byed pa'o// bdag cag na ye shes
rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du ma sam tI de dag ni sbyin ba de la klom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa des rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa'i rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa la rlom
sams su ma byed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims de dang/ bzod pa de dang/ brtson 'grus de dang/ bsam gtan de dang/ shes rab de la rlom sems su mi phyed do// shes
rag des rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyi rlom sems su mi byed do// shes rab la rlom sems su ma byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha chol tu phyin pa la/
rnam par rtog ba de dag med de/ des na rlom sems su mi byed ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de ) desan rlom sems su mi
bye dpa'i phyir ro// deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dilta sta sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
[n: ]@#// tu phyin pa'i bka'adi ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phar ro// de ltar na de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa mngon ba ma shes ba dang/ de drag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
bas yongs su zin pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin te/ pha la tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis legs par yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa
thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi legs par yongs su zin pa yin no// legs par yongs su zin pa'i phyir nyan thosakyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// khrag 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am ) rong sangs rgyas kyi sur mi
ltung bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun tu 'dzin pa yin no// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
zlo las dang po pas/ ji ltarashes zub kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ba'ab bar bgyi lags/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bzod pa'i ba la tu phyin ba dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dzaltar bslab par gyi legs/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis tsho dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la slob par 'dod ba dang/ de bzhin
dubasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
ba la slob par 'dod bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston par byed pa dang/ de bzhin du bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod
pa'i sa lo du phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bstan par bya zhing bsnyen bkur bya'o// de dag ni
byang chub sems dpa'ade la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang rung/ de thams cad
sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shing/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub de gzugs su ma rtog cig/ de bzhin du tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes par ma rtog cig/ de bzhin du gang tshul khrimagar gyi srung yang
dung bzod ba ga ci skom gang rung/ brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang rung/ bsam gtan gang dag cel snyoms par 'jug kyang rung/ shes rab gang nyisgom/
la nga rung/ de dag thams cad sams can thamasacad dang thun mong du byas la/ de'ang ma dmigs pa'i tshulakyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig/ de bzhi
du khyod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de gzugs sum rtog cig/ de bzhin du tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes par ma rtog
cig khyod bla na ma dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de sbyin pa'ib rol tu phyin par ma rtogathig/ tshul khrims kyi ba spol tu phyin par ma rtog cig/ bzod ba'i pa khol tu phyin pa
dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma rtog cig/ de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub de nang stong ba nyid dang/ phyi stong ba nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos bo med pa'i ngo be tade stong ba nyid kyi bar dag du ma rtog cig/ de bzhin du blo na med pa yang dag bar
rdzogs pa'i byang chub de dran ba te par gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi
zhi/ yan lag rnams dang/ lam dag tu ma rtog cig/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba
nyid du ma rtog cig ces ston te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dparalas dang bo panyid kyis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha tshol tu phyin pa khri pa las/
snga ltas kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi ngeshu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' las dang po ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa b.ratshal ba dang/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pa krol tu phyin pa dang// brtson 'grus
kyi be rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byon pa la slob par 'tshal bas ) gang dag shes rab
kyi ba krol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag b.raston par bgyid pa dag dang/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha la tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha la tu phyin ba
dang tshul khrims kyi ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i 'a khol du phyin ba ston pa dag 'di skad du/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod tshu shog ) khyod sems can rnams la sbyin ba gang ca gtong
[p]// lang rung/ de thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yos
sustos shing/ khyod bla na med pa yang dgakhar rdzogs pa'i byang chub de sbyin pa'i pha lol du phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ) brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa las rtog pa ram byed cig ) de bzhin du bla na mod ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong ba nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang ) dngos 'o
med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi ba la las rtog pa'am khyed cig/ de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dran ba ta ba ra gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba
rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang bo rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 3 lam las rtog bar ma byed cig/ de ltar
gong ma bzhin du sbyar to/ khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma rtog cig ces ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsten
[s/ ]par bgyi zhing/ bstan par bgyi ba lags/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba lags ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byord ltar gzugs las mi rtog na/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen ba nyid de rjes su thob bar ra rgyu'ago/ de bzhinang chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams las mi rtog cing/ rnam par shes ba las mi rtog na/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen paskyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha la tu phyin pa las rnam par ma rtog pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i ba 'ol tu phyin

pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha khol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi la thol du phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjesasu thob par 'gyur ro//

de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i do bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ba las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob pa 'gyur
ro de bzhin du rngan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang ) de bzhin du yang dag bar so ya rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang//
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnams dang/ 'phags pa'ilam yan lag brgyad pa dag las mi rtog na ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te
da @#/// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pa las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par byed do/ ]rab 'byor gzhan
bdu byang chub sems dbang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir yang dag bar bstan pa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ byang chub sems dpar 'di skad ces 'doms
shing rjes su ston te/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs la 'dogo ba ma skyed cig/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
byed rnams dang/ rnam par ng shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ deci'i phyir zhe na kyi rigs kyi bu gzugs na 'dod pa med cing 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyira'o// tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin du kyi rigs kyi bu khyed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i rtsom
tu+on ba la 'dod pa me skyid cig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi ba la
du phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyod cig/ nang stong pa tid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang ) phyi nang stong ba nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid/
kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par song ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams
dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ mngon par shes pa la la 'dod pa ma skyodacig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul 'dod
ba ma skyed cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la 'dod ba ma skad cig de bzhin du sbyar te rigs kyi bu khyod rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rigs kyi bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'a dod pa med pa dang/ 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// zhes/
kyi bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub la 'dod ba ma

skyed cig/ kyi rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa'i skyonam da ba dang/ slan mod ba yang dag par tshogs ba'i byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyid cig/ de ci'i phyir zhi ra dkyi rigs kyi bu sman med pa dang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'dod pa med pa dang/ 'dod par gu ba ma yin ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/skye shes kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal ba
dang/ bcom ldan 'das la ) tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag

ragamtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa' rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'tshal ba de ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ji skad sa pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i

chen po gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don duganyer zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtog pa
'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byora'on kyang byang rlu ba sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang rmi lam lta bu r shes nas// 'jig rten
rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/ bdag cag ni'ijig rten rnams kyi ga sa dang/ skyob pa dang/ skyabu

dang dpung gnyen dang/ gling dang ) sgron ma 'dzin pa dang 'od khyed kha dang/ deng dpon dang lo ngos su 'dren pa dang/ rton du 'gyu bar bya'o// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag 'jig rten rnams kyi don du yang dag ba ra zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
dba' dag sbyin ba gang gtong ba de thams cad sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir gtong ngo// de bzhin du tshul khrims gang srung ba dang/ bzod ba gang sgom pa dang/
brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang/ bsam gtan gang dag la snyoms par 'jug ba dang/ shes rab gang dag sgom pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar
bar bya ba'i phyir byed do/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dag 'jig rten rnams kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// rapo 'byorajaltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' la bdag pas sa pa chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la ban par yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po bdag
kyang pa sngol tu phyin pa drug la sbyod la/ sems can rnams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dba'asams dpa'i
chen po dga' joge rten rnams la lan bar pa/nga dag par zhugs pa yin no/// rab 'byor ji lta na byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la bde ba'i phyir yang
shAkya/ (dag par zhugs ba yin zhe na/ kha 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen bo dag bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la gnas la da'i 'og
dusams can gzhan rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la bde ba'i phyir yang
dag par zhugs pa yin no// ba 'byor ji ltar na byung chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen bo dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhen/ gnas par 'os pa'i phyi redang
'jig pa med pa'i grong khyer du byin par byed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ba yin no// 'ba'
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyobs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ngan song gsum du
snyas ba dag mthong nas/ ngan song de dag nas skyob bar byed cing ) zhi ba'i gnas kyang yang dag bar 'dzin du 'jug la 'god par byed de/ rub 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyob pa yin no// de ba 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen bo dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin zhe na/
rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa lasams dpa lags chen po dag rten med pa'i chos ston to// 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
rnam par shes bal ldan ba ra ma byed la/ sams can de dag chos de khros nas skye ba dang/ rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ sma sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/
'khrug ba dag las yongs su thar pa rab gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin no//
(shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khru ba bam po tadeshugacig pa/// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dpung gnyen/
yin zhe na/ sa 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag lam gyi rnam pa la mkhas ba dag dang/ lam ngan pa bzhugs pa'i sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos ston
to gzugs kyi pha grol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam bar shes pa'i pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med
pa'o ngo de bzhin du mig gi pha lo ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi pha rol ni rtag du 'a jigs ba med pa'o//
shAkya// de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs ba med pa'o// de bzhin du sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu/
'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du mig ka khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ mig gi rnam pa shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang/
sgra'i khams dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i kham dang/ sna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lcelikhams dang/ ro'i khams dang/ lce'i rnam ba
shes pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams dang/ reg pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi khams dang/ chos kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes
pa u0f7a khams kyi pha bo la ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du ma rig pa'i pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med
lco pa'o de pazhin du dran pa nye ba'agazhag pa rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o// de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o//
de bzhin du stsal to ) sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyibar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jags pa med pa'o// de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
dang rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa ted kyi pha khol ni rtog tu 'jigs ba med pa'o// gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/
'du phye da rnams dang/ rnam pa lngashes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de na rnam par shes pa ma yin no// de bzhin du mag gi ba srol gang na ba de mag ma yin no// de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/
lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni bde ba yin no// de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs ma yin no// de bzhin du sgra dang/ dri dang/
'od ng/ rig pa dang/ chos rnams kyi pha grol gang yin pa de dag ni sa rnams ma yin no// de bzhin du mig gi kha mas kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi khams ma yin no// de bzhin du
gzugs kyi khams dang ) mag gi rnam par shes pa'ikhams kyi ba sogasal gang yin pa de na mig gi rnam par shes ba'ikhams ma yin no// de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang ) sgalams dang
rnakha rnam pa shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam pa rashes pa'i khams ma yin no// de bzhin du rna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sa'i rnam
bar shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/ ro'i khams dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams dang/ rig pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi
rnam par shes pa likhams dang/ yid kyi khams dang/ chos kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de na yod kyi rnam par/
'ashes pa'i khams ma yin no// de bzhin du ma rig pa'il pol gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi pha khol gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin no// de bzhin du
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pa la gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyarate/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ban gyi pa srol gang yin
pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'il srol gang yan ba de dag na de bzhin ga shigs pa'i stebs bcu ma yin tshe//
de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi la la gang yin pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma pane ne 3 de bzhin du thams cad
shes pa nyid dang/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snga rdzol gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// rab 'byor chos 'di dag gi ba 'o/
ji lta ba pachos thams cad kyang de lta bu yin no// gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag ga re mol ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de lta bu lags na//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta na ni byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rtogs par sangs rgyas par ma 'gyur lags sam/ de ci'i slad du zhin ) btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba'o// 'di ni 'du shes so// 'du na 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam ba shes pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'dra nirnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi bar du yin no snyam du gzugasakyi la la na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i pha la dang/ 'du shes kyi pha rol dang/ 'du byed rnams kyi kha rol dang/ rnam bar shes pa'i
pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rolo na rnam par rtog pa ci'ang ma mchis pa'islad du'o// bcom/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyiraji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba
byed pa yin te/ chos 'di dag 'di ltar zhi ba/ 'di ltar zub pa la nges bar sems kyang zhum par ma 'gyurati/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag gis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste//
de ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ltar zab pa'i chos 'di dag sems can rnams la bstan par bya'o snyam du sems pa ste/
kya// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dbu ngag rten yin no/ ba 'khyer ji lta na khyad chub sems dpa' sems/
dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gling yinazhen/ rab 'byopa'id lta ste/ dpar na chu klung dag gam/ mtsho'am/ mtsho chen po dag gam/ rgya mtsho dag gis phyogs 'di dag chus kun tu chod pa/

gang dag yin pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang ! phyi ma'i mthar yongs su chad pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de kho na bzhin du
mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sams can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mthar
yongs su chad pa de byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhinadusnga to/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sngon gyi mthar dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs pa khong du chud nas sems
can rnams la chos ston to// kha 'khyor sngon gyis thar dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' longs su chad pa 'dis thams cad yongs su chad pa yin no// rab 'phyo chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i
mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa 'a di ni zhi ba gya nom pa ji lta ba bzhin yin te/ 'di lta ste stong ba nyid dang/ dmigs su med pa zhes lam yongs su chad pa dang/ srod pa zad ba dang/ lhag
ma ma lus pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams
kyi gling yin no/ rab 'byor ji ltar byung chub sems dpa' ga mas dpa' chen po dga' dag rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin ba dang 'od byed pa yin zhi na/ brtson ldan ngag gis de dag gi
don de kho na'ade khon lta rtogasanas de kho na bzhin du 'dzanicingasams can rnams la'ang ston la/ sems can rnams kyang de yang dag pa ra' dzan du 'jugacing 'dzung la rab tu 'gong bar byed pa ste//
rab 'byorade lta'an byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dga' jig rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang 'od byed pa yin no/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chubusems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang yongs su 'dren pa yin zhi na/ rab 'byor 'dal byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po dag sems can las ngan par zhugs ba
'gro ba ngan pa'i 'aglobaka'aglob dag la sams can rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ mya ngan dang gnod pa dgalas yang dag par 'da' ba bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bdag nub pa'athu ba
dang rigs pa'i chos rtogs par bya ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig palam ston par byed do// de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzo gas pa'i byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la
chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang ga 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba
med bar sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du rgyu nadu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyi'i ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang
rang byung chub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa mad pa dang/ rnam par byang ba mad par sams can rnams la
la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sams dba'asems dpa' chen po dga' jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang yongs su 'ad+dan pa yin no// rab 'byor
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdud
sbyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ don spyod pa dang/ don mthun bas sems can rnams bsdus nas/ sems can de dag de la gzugs nam mkha'i
tshul can du chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba nam mkha'atshul can du chos ston to// de ltar gong ma bzhazhedu sbyar te/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i tshul can du chosaston to// gzhan yang ma 'os pa'i gzugs ni stong pa nyid de/ de nageng nas kyang 'ong ba med la// gang du'ang 'grob yod pa'i
sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du ma 'os pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ ma 'ongs ba'i rnam par shes pa nastong pa nyid de/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med
la gang du'ang 'gro bamad par sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni stong pa nyid de/ da ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/
gang du'ang 'gro ba mdaparasems can rnams la chos ston to/ ras 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dba'asoms dpa' chen po de dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin no// de ci'i
phyibazhin/ chos thams cad ni stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mod pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' ba'i phyir/
shug/ rong da ce'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong ba nyid dang ) mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dag la ni 'ong ba 'am// 'gro ba ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab
'byorachos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// rab 'byor skyo ba med pa dang/
'gag ba med ba dang/ kun nas nyon mos ba med ba dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba ci'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/
chos thams cad ni skyo ba med pa dang/ lag ga pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba bad ba'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bo de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba bod pa dag la ni 'ong
blo 'am/ 'gro ba col mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams ca da na skya ma dang/ sing+geg rgyu dang/ chu zla dang/ rma lam dang/ brag cha dang ) sbal pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub
sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de dag las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyole zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ chu zla dang/ rmi lam dang/ mig yoradang/
lha/ brag cha dang/ stsal pa dag la ni 'gro ba ram/ 'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'a bri ba med pa dang/ bstan pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub/
sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor 'bri ba med pa dang/ bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci'ong
mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
la 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can la ra gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba cirang ma dmigs pa'i phyi ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyarak+She/ chos thams cad ni blad dumad pa dang/ dor du med pa'i bar
gyi tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor blang du med pa dang/ de'adu mad pa la/
'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorachos thams cad na 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dbar sam sa dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul/
de las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyire zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dre ba med pa la na 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad na bdag med ba'i tshul can te/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs
pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni sams can yod pa dang/ srog med ba dang/ skya ba mad pa dang/ gso ba med pa dang/ gang zag
med pa dang/ shing las skyes pa med pa dang/ shod bu med pa dang/ slong ba po med pa dang/ kun nas slong ba po med pa dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed du 'jug pa po dang/
shes pa po dang/ mthong ba bo med pa'i tshul can te ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las ma 'da' 'o/ ) de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag gtan
med cing mi dmigs pa dang/ de bzhin du sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ shod bu dang/ slong ba po dang )
kun nas slong ba bo dang/ byed pa bo dang/ byed du 'jug pa po dang/ shes pa po dang ]mthong ba po med cing ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang
chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i tshul can dang ) ma rtag pa'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad nabade ba'i tshul can dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshul can dang/ bdag
0 gi tshul canadang bdag med pa'i tshul can dang/ stong pa'i tshul can dang/ ma stong pa'i tshul can dang/ mtshan ma'i tshul can dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can dang/ smon pa'i
tshul can dang/ smon ba med pa'i tshulanyan dang 3 zhi ba'i tshul can dang/ dben pa'i tshul can dang ) kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul can dang/ rnam par byang ba'i tshul can dang skyaba'i tshul
can dang/ skya ba med pa'i tshul can dang/ 'gag ba'i tshul can dang/ 'gag pamed pa'i tshul can dang/ dngos po'i tshul can dang dngos ba med pa'i tshul can dang/ sdug pa'i tshul can dang ( mi
sdug pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las ma u0f7a da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rtog pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bdag dang/ sdug pa'i ba du gtan med nyingam dmags te/ de'i phyir de dag gi 'gro ba
'a'o 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byochos thams cad na de'i dod chags kyi gzhi rten dang/ zhe sdang gi gzhi can dang/ gti mug ga gzhacan te/ tshul de las mi 'da'a'o// de ci'i phye zhin
rab 'byo 'dod chags kyi gzhi dang/ zhe sdang gi gzhi dang/ gti mug gigazhi gtan chod cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor chos thams
cad n lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi can te/ tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// deci' ra'o na/ rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa gzhi gtan med cing gi dmagasan/ de dag gis 'grob 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod
pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad na de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can dang/ chos kyi dbus kyi tshul canadang ) yang dag pa'i mthu'i tshul can dang/ mnyam
po ba nyidikyi tshulacan dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab ba dubyanges kyi tshul can te/ tshul de lasami 'da'o 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorade bzhin nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ yang dag
pa'i mtha' dang/ chos mnyam pa nyid dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyanges gtanamed cing me dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yodapa'i phyir ro// rab 'abyor chos
thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa'i tshul can te tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyi zhin/ rab 'byor gang 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i g.yo ba nyid gang yang med cing ma demigs pa'i
phyir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba'i tshul can dang/ 'du shes kyi tshulatsan dang/ 'du byed rnams
kyi tshel can dang/ rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na ) rab 'byor gzugs med cing ma dmigs pa dang/ de bzhin du tshorab pa dang/ 'dushegs
dang/ 'du byed rnams dang ) rnam par shes ba med cing ma dmigs na de dag gi 'gro ba ram/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i re'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i tshul can to/
tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyogs zhen 1 rab 'byor sbyin pa gtanamed cing mi dmigs na/ nga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor de ba zhanyid chos thams cad ni tshul khrims/
kyi tshul can dang/ bzod pa'i tshul can dang/ brtson 'grus kyi tshul can dang/ bsam gtan gyi tshul can dang/ shes rab kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las ma 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab gtan med cing mi dmigasan/ de dag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i

ba rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha sngol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi la rtsolagadu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod pa'i pere'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
ninang stong ba nyid kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'dara'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs nA/ de dag ga 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i
phyi lo// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshul canadang/ de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyab kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las ma 'da' 'o//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyade ni gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorachos thams cad
bya/ ni dran pa nye bgragazhag pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las ma 'a da' 'o// rab 'byoka de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bar
gyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gtani mdacingam dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/
pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chosathams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'itshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad kyi bsngagyi tshul can te/ tshul de las ma 'a dang 'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byorasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gtan mad cing ma dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba
'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i 'uraro// rab 'abyorachos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang ) rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i'abras bugatan mad
cing mi dmigs ba dang/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong b.li'i bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rangasangs rgyas nyid gtan med cing mi dmigasan/ de dag gi 'gro ba
ram 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blan med pa la da dug kha ra rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da' 'o// de cig phyir zhi na/
rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gtan med cing ma dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyira'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la su dag mngon par yid ches shing mos par
'gyuralags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen bo gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub du spyod pa spyad
ba deg dang/ sngon gyi lang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi drung du tshangs pa 'gyod pa spyad pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyod ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
zane ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon pa yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ro// kasol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo ba nyade de ci 'dra ba zhig du 'gyuralags/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de dag rtagasan ci 'dra ba zhig/ mtshan ma ni ci 'dra ba zhige/ dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byob// sams dbar chan bdad
byang chub sems dparasams dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon bar yid ches shing mos par 'gyur dedag gsams kyi ngo bo 'di na 'dod chags dang/ zhi
lasdang dang/ gti mug 'dul ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dug shes rab kyi ba lol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dag la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur
ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi rdzogs dang/ mtshan ma dang/ dbyibs kyis dben bdag tu 'gyur ro// gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dba' sams dpa' chen po gang dag shes thub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yadi chesashing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ji ltabu'i tshul can du 'gyur lags/bcom lda 'das kyis bka'
zlostsal ba/rab 'abyor byang chub sams dbar soms dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon bar yid ches shingamos par 'gyur ba de dag na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
za kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro// gso ba pa// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dag 'di lta sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis
pa'i sgom pa dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'itshul can du 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni chos thams cad rnam b.la'ajig
